Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Sample statements for the acknowledgment of the eMERGE GWAS dataset(s) can be found at the following link: eMERGE dbGaP Acknowledgment Statements (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/cgi-bin/GetPdf.cgi?document_name=eMERGE_Acknowledgement.pdf). Please include all Acknowledgment Statements relevant to the dataset(s) used in your analysis.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Health Research - Group Health Seattle
ConsentGroup.name: HR_GHS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: These data will be used only for health related research, including research to improve methods for health related research.

ConsentGroup.title: Dementia or Aging - Group Health Seattle
ConsentGroup.name: AGING_GHS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Limited to health research on dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. This includes research to improve methods for conducting research that could be applied to dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. For example, studies of conditions like cataract, diabetes, and psoriasis might be appropriate, while conditions like attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and neuroblastoma might not be appropriate. Studies of conditions that are common in both children and the elderly, such as schizophrenia or depression, would not be appropriate if they focused on children or young adults. Studies focused primarily on pediatric populations are not permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health Research - Marshfield Clinic
ConsentGroup.name: HR_MC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems. No Permitted Use: Insurance companies

ConsentGroup.title: Health Research - Vanderbilt U
ConsentGroup.name: HR_VU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems.

ConsentGroup.title: Health Research - Mayo Clinic
ConsentGroup.name: HR_MYO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Mayo Clinic Data may only be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems.
Investigators must state in the Data Use Request their intention to publish or otherwise broadly share any findings from his or her study with the scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Health Research - Northwestern U
ConsentGroup.name: HR_NWU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems
No Permitted Use: Insurance companies
